column4: hey all, anyone happen to know how to make open office or abiword save as xhtml?
xhtml is not among the options
Which version of OO?  On 3.0.1 it is the first export option.
for me pdf is the first option... same version... this is odd
it wont export from an htm, just fyi.
Interesting.  Maybe save as odf first then export?
copy pasted to a new file, now i'm having problems with the export function itself, first jre whining now cant save to file, i'm tinkiering
I have not used the xhtml export myself.
Sorry to hear that.  OO 3.X has been working very well for me for some time now.
thank you for your help :) I think abiword is going to be able to do it
did you happen to solve the save error? *hope hope hope*
I am looking at a fedora bug report that might have some clues.
oh goodie so it's not my fault heheh
